sentences.english: I don&apost know why - but it does.
sentences.chinese: 我不清楚是何故，但确实如此。

sentences.english: That somehow I know within me lies.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故所明晓的那种真正存在。

sentences.english: But somehow, at that moment, she could not explain it.
sentences.chinese: 但不知何故，在那一刻，她无法解释。

sentences.english: Somehow, this really doesn’t seem the green agenda many people voted for.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故，这确实不像是多数人投票赞成的绿色议程。

sentences.english: Tumor cells that spread to other sites somehow escape anoikis.
sentences.chinese: 扩散到其他部位的肿瘤细胞不知何故能逃脱失巢凋亡。

sentences.english: During the day-time I somehow managed to control it.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故，我整天都想设法控制它。

sentences.english: Without reasons, I have ever loved pure colour, especially white dress.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故，自幼便酷爱净色，尤爱纯白色的服装。

sentences.english: Interpol swooped in, but somehow my brother evaded their grasp.
sentences.chinese: 国际刑警突袭那儿，却不知何故，哥哥又逃脱了抓捕。

sentences.english: They prolonged the war for unknown reasons.
sentences.chinese: 不知何故，他们拖长了这场战争。

sentences.english: Atta's luggage never made it onto the plane which he would commandeer.
sentences.chinese: 阿塔的行李不知何故未能上飞机。

sentences.english: I look closely, found that slightly pigeon legs, hair pin, worth why.
sentences.chinese: 我仔细一看发现鸽子腿上略有毛脚，不值何故。

sentences.english: I don't know why - but it does.
sentences.chinese: 我不清楚是何故，但确实如此。

sentences.english: They used caustics , and somehow ran energy along these curves.
sentences.chinese: 他们利用焦散，不知何故跑到沿着这些曲线的能量。

sentences.english: Somehow, I think they will be fine.
sentences.chinese: 但不知何故，我认为他们会没事的。

sentences.english: Why a bird is missing from my picture?
sentences.chinese: 我的百鸟朝凤图，何故连鸟头都不见了？

sentences.english: But somehow, his past never became part of our conversation.
sentences.chinese: 但不知何故，他的过去始终没有成为我们的谈话内容。

definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
I have been enlightened by your teaching (humble)
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
how could one dare?/I don't deserve such praise
that being the case/then/in that case
